feed.title: AO3 - Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: As Below, So Below-Below
entry.summary:
Author: muscovite

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,581Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: A mansion with an English butler traditionally has two layers: the plush lives of the owners above-stairs, and the hidden bustle of the staff below. Wayne Manor has a secret third thing.Bruce wants to build a Batcave. Alfred cannot be incinerating the candle at both ends. He needs staff. And, difficult as it is to admit, he needs much more help than Master Bruce would possibly trust. But a butler is well used to smoothing over appearances. The owner and his increasingly large family need not know exactly how many people are paddling like mad underneath.They need not know about the unusual ability of the admirable and lovely Ms. Kyle, either.A fic about community, told in part through the eyes of the workers who bless this mess.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Pistolbag

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 105,891Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 186

Summary: In Gotham’s grim streets, there’s always a new face: an old ghost in a new skin. But when a young girl, feral and untrained, is discovered in a dark corner of Gotham's underground by Batman and Robin during a mission to stop David Cain, the dynamic of the Bat-Family is forever changed.

entry.title: The Anniversary
entry.summary:
Author: FrancescaTreadgold

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,883Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: On the anniversary of a death he never recovered from, Neal Caffrey stops being Neal Caffrey. The FBI sees him freeze.The Batfamily sees him fall apart. When seven furious, terrified vigilantes storm an FBI conference room, the truth comes out in a single breath:Neal Caffrey is Bruce Wayne.And today is the day he lost a son. But grief doesn’t care about secret identities.And family doesn’t care about aliases. A one‑shot about the moment everything breaks — and the people who refuse to let him break alone.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,835Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 523

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: Cursed Child
entry.summary:
Author: J4YYYZ

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,772Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 467

Summary: Bruce gets de-aged into a 16-year old after being hit by an alien weapon from an attempted invasion. The 16 year old who trained under the LOA.The 16 year old who ran away from Alfred.The 16 year old who was manipulated into something else.The 16 year old who was made a weapon.The 16 year old who never had a childhood. Bruce tries to forget the days of when he trained under Ra's, but small habits and reflexes he thought were long gone start to resurface, along with memories being freshly remembered as if it was yesterday. It haunts him slowly, eating him out from the inside before taking action after playing with its food.

entry.title: The Grayson Effect
entry.summary:
Author: pansley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,519Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 296

Summary: With Jason gone, Batman and Robin are stretched too thin. New villains seem to be arriving — or returning — almost every day. Gotham is left in a constant state of restoration. And the truce between Bruce and his two eldest sons is tenuous at best, and dangerously volatile at worst. It would be the absolute worst time for his youngest to be abducted. Or: Dick finds himself at the mercy of the older brother he didn’t know he had. Saving himself might just mean saving Damian, too.

entry.title: The Nutcracker (but it's really not)
entry.summary:
Author: lost_orsomething

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,068Chapters: 3/24Kudos: 1

Summary: [Based on The Nutcracker by E.T.A Hoffman and the goat Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky] Christmas parties have been something that Tim Drake might've more or less grew up in, but when Clark Kent shows up unexpectedly with a nutcracker from off-world and the nuisance, Conner Kent, his night takes a turn for the weirder. An ill dream leads Tim and a personified nutcracker (played by yours truly, Kon-el) through Gotham and Metropolis villains, to a world they've never seen before. He comes face to face with members of the Justice League, siblings, and other... people... who all have their priorities out of order. Featuring Batman as Mother Ginger and too many inconsistent appearences by too many child-soldier robins This is not my first fic but by all accounts it really should be... I'm chronically disastrous at plotting so I specialize in wack stuff where no one knows what's happening. I wrote 87.66638% of this sleep deprived. Good luck, soldier.

entry.title: I Wear The Black
entry.summary:
Author: Gezmall

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,084Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 293

Summary: An impostor is running around Gotham. A billowing figure tanking gunshots like they were confetti. He wears the bat-symbol like it's his own, but with spikes across his shoulders and back, making it clear he's not the friendly type. The cape, large and matte, splits by the end into tendrils, attaching themselves to the ceiling and walls like itty-bitty grappling hooks. No. Not like grappling hooks per se, Nightwing numbly noted, like small batclaws. "That was not Batman," Nightwing reminisced with more ease than he felt. "There's a fairly," he raised his hand where the real Batman's height ended, "big difference." Or Absolute Batman lands in the Mainline universe and learns that maybe his mission doesn't need to be a lonely one.

entry.title: Wayne Manor Mayhem
entry.summary:
Author: LarkspurB

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,774Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 37

Summary: He could have blamed the pounding headache behind his eyes.    It throbbed in time with his heartbeat, a deep, nauseating pulse that made the world tilt. But he knew exactly why he went down.   His boots were too large.   The moment his foot caught on the uneven warehouse floor, he lost his balance.

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,132Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 294

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 130,147Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 267

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Father's Day

entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,304Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: In this New Age of a New Batman, ancient enemies will come from the woodwork, dangers will be all around, and who will be there to face off against them other than Batman. The Seventh of these guardians of Gotham, he will fight, he will save, and he will build up from everything, but like all Batmen, there is one evil he will face that no Batman has ever truly defeated, but that won't stop him from trying.

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 137,823Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 4,270

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:“Mother, do you remember those funny clouds above people’s heads I told you about? Well, I’m doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it’s just me. I’m the problem. I can’t seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know–-… I’m aware that it’s due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.”Bruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.“I just wish there was someone that cared about me.”

entry.title: Hal Jordan and the woe of having situational awareness
entry.summary:
Author: aineran

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,339Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 299

Summary: Hal Jordan is smart, more than he acts like. He also has situational awareness despite some's (cough Batman's cough) disbelief.Batman is broody, paranoid asshole. Nightwing is an angel sent from above and Red Hood is an infamous crime lord. There's Robin, Red Robin, Black Bat and all the Gotham vigilantes who are supposedly unrelated... so why does Hal keep on catching small gestures that indicate otherwise?Hal is unsure and confused about his whole situation. Batman is being grumpy and the kids... they're fine, right? And Hal's fine too, right? Batman wouldn't make him conveniently disappear, would he?
